name: C.A.T.F.I.G.H.T
description:
Have you ever played a triple A fighting game and thought, "this controls too well"? Have you played a wrestling game, and saw gravity simulated with a disappointingly high strength? Do you love the hyper-realism of QWOP, but hate that it's singleplayer?

LOOK NO FURTHER! Grab a buddy and pile drive their head into the ninth level of Tartarus! Suplex them through the ceiling! There are no moves, just physics!

NOW WITH CONTROLLER SUPPORT: Just plug in your gamepad during the "Controls" screen!

Developed by Ryan Beaumont and Carl Kinyon
